name: HEAR CI Prediction Model
intended_use: Support clinicians estimating outcome probability for cochlear implantation
Decision support tool in pre-operative planning
not_intended_for: Autonomous clinical decisions without human oversight
limitations: Not validated outside University Hospital Essen population
Predictions should be interpreted as supportive evidence
May not generalize to significantly different populations

ethical_considerations.fairness: Model tested for bias across age groups and gender
ethical_considerations.privacy: All patient data anonymized, GDPR compliant

changelog:
Improved from v1 (LogisticRegression) by adding ensemble method with Random Forest. Accuracy improved from 0.68 to 0.74. Better handling of non-linear feature interactions.

**Retired 2026-02-17:** Replaced by v3 with improved hyperparameters and class weighting.
